Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS AS P ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID #WHERE# #ORDER#

WITH total_price AS ( SELECT ORD_DATE::DATE AS ORD_DATE,PRO_SELLER_ID, SUM(OL_PRICE * OL_UNITS) AS AMOUNT_PRICE, COUNT(OL.ORD_ID) as ORD_COUNT FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID JOIN ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS AS P ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID JOIN ${mainschema}.USR_USER AS UU ON UU.USR_ID = P.PRO_SELLER_ID GROUP BY ORD_DATE::DATE, PRO_SELLER_ID ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM total_price #WHERE# ORDER BY ORD_DATE

WITH price_age AS ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(OL_PRICE * OL_UNITS):: numeric, 2) AS TOTAL_PRICE , DATE_PART('year', AGE(ORD_DATE, UPR_BIRTHDATE)) as AGE FROM ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID JOIN ${mainschema}.USR_PROFILE AS UP ON O.ORD_CLIENT_ID = UP.USR_ID WHERE O.ORD_PAID = true GROUP BY AGE ) SELECT CONCAT_WS(' - ',GBA_MIN_AGE,GBA_MAX_AGE) AS AGE_RANGE, sum(price_age.total_price) AS TOTAL FROM ${mainschema}.GRA_BILLED_AGE AS GBA JOIN price_age on price_age.age BETWEEN GBA_MIN_AGE and GBA_MAX_AGE GROUP BY AGE_RANGE ORDER BY AGE_RANGE
